title: Crave
description: CRAVE WAS OFFERED HEAVENBUT LOST HIS WAY.TO GET BACK HE MUST VOLUNTARILY WALK THROUGH HELL. New York Times and USA Today bestselling author, Victoria Danann, continues the paranormal romance series about a genetically altered new species. Besides being heart-stopping beautiful to look at, the hybrids are bigger, faster, stronger and smarter.Crave is the second son of Exiled's first family. He surpassed the limits of mortal endurance and survived years of torture by Exiled's sworn enemy. He'd been isolated, chained in darkness, kept in filth,starved, taken to the point of death only to be restored so that his tormentors could begin the cycle again. His family thought he was dead, but the woman who'd held his heart and his promise never gave up hope.After his rescue, his memory and sanity gone, his promised mate will plumb the depths of love to bring him back from hell, while his family and community set out to prove to him that he'll never be alone again."Just finished reading Crave and now I forgive Victoria Danann for Carnal. Wonderful story and exactly what Exiled fans needed. Thank you for another great read." - Amazon ReviewDon't miss the powerful and moving follow up to Carnal. Start reading today and find out why readers are calling Crave exciting and compelling with THE single most potent romantic gesture in the history of romance. One of Danann's most satisfying HEAs to date. Guaranteed.
author: Victoria Danann
